sentences.chinese: 销售及市场学，公关，服务业。

sentences.english: Putuo District is the hinterland where Shanghai plans to develop the modern service industry.
sentences.chinese: 普陀区是上海发展现代服务业的腹地。

sentences.english: The financial services industry worldwide will never be the same.
sentences.chinese: 全球金融服务业将会焕然一新。

sentences.english: Since the community service industry in Quanzhou city starts late, it develops rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 泉州市的社区服务业起步较迟，但发展很快。

sentences.english: There is own characteristics for the group technology in service industry.
sentences.chinese: 服务业中的成组技术有其自己的特点。

sentences.english: The strategetic reconstruction of YangPu modern service industry development is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文构建了杨浦区发展现代服务业的战略体系。

sentences.english: The third part is the elemental analysis of the investment environment of modern service in Jinan City.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为济南市现代服务业投资环境的要素分析。

sentences.english: The modern service industry in Hezhou is developing vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 贺州现代服务业蓬勃发展。

sentences.english: Productivity levels in many service industries must be ming-bogglingly low.
sentences.chinese: 在服务业中生存效率必定极其低下。

sentences.english: Researching Group of Service Survey Center of Nati.
sentences.chinese: 国家统计局服务业调查中心课题组。

sentences.english: The development of modern service industry cluster districts(MSICD) twines together with the growing of the comprehensive transportation hub.
sentences.chinese: 现代服务业集聚区与综合交通枢纽共生共荣。

sentences.english: Grow the new servicing business of credit to have mightiness power of processing credit product.
sentences.chinese: 培育具有强大加工信用产品能力的新型服务业。

sentences.english: It plans to develop the catering service in the area alongside Guoji Road.
sentences.chinese: 在国基路两侧地区，拟大力发展餐饮服务业。

sentences.english: We will give Hong Kong and Macao greater access to the mainland's service sector.
sentences.chinese: 扩大内地服务业对港澳的开放。

sentences.english: Expanding the VAT system to the service sector would also help reduce distortions.
sentences.chinese: 而将增值税向服务业领域扩展也有助于减少扭曲。
